INSURANCE_CATEGORY.NODATA_TITLE_LIFE: It looks like you don't have any Life Insurance
INSURANCE_CATEGORY.NODATA_DESC_1_LIFE: Often used to leave money to spouse or children, or to protect a family if a primary provider dies prematurely.
INSURANCE_CATEGORY.NODATA_DESC_2_LIFE: When an insured person dies, the beneficiary they have chosen receive the life insurance money to help lighten their financial burden.
INSURANCE_CATEGORY.NODATA_TITLE_DISABILITY: It looks like you don't have any Disability Insurance
INSURANCE_CATEGORY.NODATA_DESC_1_DISABILITY: Disability insurance can help protect you and your family from an unexpected illness or accident that leaves you unable to work and earn an income.
INSURANCE_CATEGORY.NODATA_DESC_2_DISABILITY: Generally, disability insurance replaces between 60% and 85% of your regular income, up to a maximum amount, for a specified time.
INSURANCE_CATEGORY.NODATA_TITLE_CRITICAL: It looks like you don't have any Critical Illness Insurance
INSURANCE_CATEGORY.NODATA_DESC_1_CRITICAL: Critical illness insurance usually pays a one-time lump-sum payment if you're diagnosed with a life-threatening illness.
INSURANCE_CATEGORY.NODATA_DESC_2_CRITICAL: The lump-sum payment may cover expenses such as daycare or renovations to make your home more accessible.
INSURANCE_CATEGORY.NODATA_TITLE_LONGTERMCARE: It looks like you don't have any Long Term Care Insurance.
INSURANCE_CATEGORY.NODATA_DESC_1_LONGTERMCARE: Long term care insurance can provide coverage if you become unable to care for yourself and need assistance to manage daily living activities.
INSURANCE_CATEGORY.NODATA_DESC_2_LONGTERMCARE: The insurance may pay an annuity to cover, for instance, long-term stays in specialized care centres or in-home care.

POLICY_STATUS.TITLE: POLICY STATUS
POLICY_STATUS.CANCELLED_DESC: You cancelled this insurance policy application.
POLICY_STATUS.REFUSED_DESC: You insurance application was declined by the insurer.

CLAIMS.TITLE: CLAIMS
CLAIMS.EXPLANATION: Making a claim is different for different types of insurance. For information about how to make a  claim, choose your type of insurance.
CLAIMS.LIFE_CALL_DETAILS: Your broker will inform your insurance company and have the necessary claim paperwork sent
CLAIMS.LIFE_DOCUMENT_1: a copy of the birth certificate
CLAIMS.LIFE_DOCUMENT_2: a copy of the death certificate
CLAIMS.DISABILITY_CALL_DETAILS: Your broker will inform your insurance company and have the necessary claim paperwork sent
CLAIMS.DISABILITY_DOCUMENT_1: a completed claim form from the policyholder (may be completed with your broker)
CLAIMS.DISABILITY_DOCUMENT_2: a completed form from your treating physician
CLAIMS.DISABILITY_DOCUMENT_3: a completed form from your employer
CLAIMS.SOINS_LONGUE_DUREE_CALL_DETAILS: Your broker will inform your insurance company and have the necessary claim paperwork sent
CLAIMS.SOINS_LONGUE_DUREE_DOCUMENT_1: a completed claim form from the policyholder (may be completed with your broker)
CLAIMS.SOINS_LONGUE_DUREE_DOCUMENT_2: a completed form from your treating physician
CLAIMS.CRITICAL_ILLNESS_CALL_DETAILS: Your broker will inform your insurance company and have the necessary claim paperwork sent
CLAIMS.CRITICAL_ILLNESS_DOCUMENT_1: a completed claim form from the policyholder (may be completed with your broker)
CLAIMS.CRITICAL_ILLNESS_DOCUMENT_2: a completed form from your treating physician
CLAIMS.TRAVEL_CALL_URGENT: Call The Emergency Number On Your Travel Insurance Card
CLAIMS.TRAVEL_CALL_MESSAGE_1: If at all possible, contact your insurance company using the emergency number on your travel insurance card before seeking treatment at a hospital or clinic
CLAIMS.TRAVEL_CALL_MESSAGE_2: After making this initial call, your insurance company will take care of the rest
